entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
